title: Residential - serif
content:
I cannot locate the name of this font, can anyone help?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110047im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rrr_5793.jpg)
author: vector

comments.content:
I think it’s Administer.

- Mike Yanega

Here’s the [Red Rooster version](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110047/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/tc-administer-rr/). There are others. Also called Minister.

- Mike Yanega
Thank you, odd that whatthefont could not id this, I tried

At the risk of immodesty, for serif fonts I think the [Serif Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110047/http:/typophile.com/wiki/phttp%25253A%25252F%25252Fbowfinprintworks.com%25252FSerifGuide%25252Fintro.php) is a pretty good tool, even if you only know a few letters, and don’t have a graphic sample to upload. That’s how I found it.

- Mike Yanega
